text: Kuyobe siqambele uMvelinqangi amanga uma sibuyele enkolweni yenu emva kokuthi esesisindisile uMvelinqangi kuyona, futhi akusikhona okwethu ukuthi siphindele kuyona ngaphandle uma ethanda uMvelinqangi iNkosi yethu. Inkosi yethu ingamele zonke izinto ngolwazi (lwayo) sithembele kuMvelinqangi (kuyena kuphela) Nkosi yethu hlulela phakathi kwethu naphakathi kwabantu bethu ngeqiniso futhi wena ungongcono kunabanye abehluleli
